title: Night of Praise
inviteLine: Join us for an evening of fellowship and song
description:
Building on Ephesians 5:18–19, **Night of Praise** is an opportunity to get together for an informal, relaxed evening of worship, fellowship, and refreshments.

Join **Matt Sawatzky** and **Daniel Pol** as we sing a blend of contemporary and traditional songs. Inspired by the worship found in Scripture and the church’s timeless confessions, we lift up communal praise to our Triune covenant God. Everyone is welcome, and we look forward to seeing you.
